root.name: Nelly Cootalot: Spoonbeaks Ahoy!
root.description: Background InformationDeveloper Alasdair Beckett intended this to be a quick game he could give to his girlfriend as a gift.Uses the Adventure Game Studio engine. Spoonbeaks is the game's name for Spoonbills.Well known indie adventure game composer Mark Lovegrove did the score for Nelly Cootalot.
